Description: Fragment of oval handle of a probably Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay medium, light brown; gold mica. Rectangular stamp with Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary 1884-5 (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 206, 28 or 71, 7. Perhaps the Rhodian eponym Ly(simachos).
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1576)
